unhollowerErrors.regex: .*System\.IO\.FileNotFoundException\: .* ['|"]System\.IO\.Compression.*
unhollowerErrors.error:
You are actually missing the required .NET Framework for MelonLoader.
Please make sure to install it using the following link: <https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet-framework/net48>.

unhollowerErrors.regex: System.UnauthorizedAccessException:.*
unhollowerErrors.error: The access to a file has been denied. Please make sure the game is closed when installing MelonLoader, or try restarting your computer. If this doesn't work, try running the MelonLoader Installer with administrator privileges.

unhollowerErrors.regex: System.IO.IOException: The process cannot access the file.*
unhollowerErrors.error: The access to a file has been blocked. Please make sure the game is closed when installing MelonLoader, or try restarting your computer. If this doesn't work, try running the MelonLoader Installer with administrator privileges or your Virus scanner isn't scanning.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] System.IO.IOException: The process cannot access the file.*
unhollowerErrors.error: MelonLoader failed to open a required file. Most likely, your virus scanner is still scanning MelonLoader during execution or the user running MelonLoader does not have access. Try MelonLoader again, restarting your PC, or reinstalling MelonLoader.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*SHA512 Hash from Temp File does not match Repo Hash!
unhollowerErrors.error: Installer failed to download MelonLoader successfully. Try again later or redownload the official MelonLoader installer.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\]    at MelonLoader\.AssemblyGenerator\.LocalConfig\.Save\(String path\)
unhollowerErrors.error: The access to a file has been denied. Please try starting the game with administrator privileges, or try restarting your computer (failed to save AssemblyGenerator/config.cfg)

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\]    at MelonLoader\.AssemblyGenerator\.Main\.SetupDirectory\(String path\)
unhollowerErrors.error: The access to a file has been denied. Please try starting the game with administrator privileges, or try restarting your computer (failed to setup directories)

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] Il2CppDumper.exe does not exist!
unhollowerErrors.error: MelonLoader assembly generation failed. Please delete the `MelonLoader` folder and `version.dll` file from your game folder, and install MelonLoader again (failed to download Il2CppDumper)

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[INTERNAL FAILURE\] Failed to Execute Assembly Generator!
unhollowerErrors.error: The assembly generation failed. This is most likely caused by your anti-virus. Add an exception or disable it, then try again. If that wasn't the issue then try accessing [this site](https://api.melonloader.com/api/v1/game/vrchat) and tell us if it loads.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[ERROR\] Unhandled Exception: System\.IO\.IOException: There is not enough space on the disk\.
unhollowerErrors.error: The storage space is full. Please free some space and try your game again. You need atleast 500MB free.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[ERROR\] Unhandled Exception: System.AggregateException: One or more errors occurred. ---> System.IO.IOException: There is not enough space on the disk.
unhollowerErrors.error: The storage space is full. Please free some space and try your game again. You need atleast 450MB free.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[ERROR\] Unhandled Exception: System\.Collections\.Generic\.KeyNotFoundException: The given key was not present in the dictionary\.
unhollowerErrors.error: Key Not Found. This is most likely caused by your anti-virus. Add an exception or disable it, then reinstall MelonLoader 0.4.0.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] ERROR: Can't use auto mode to process file, try manual mode.
unhollowerErrors.error: Il2CppDumper generation failed. Please verify the integrity of your game or reinstall MelonLoader.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[INTERNAL FAILURE\] Failed to Find Mono Directory!
unhollowerErrors.error: Missing Mono Directory. Please verify the integrity of your game or reinstall MelonLoader.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[INTERNAL FAILURE\] MelonLoader.dll Does Not Exist!
unhollowerErrors.error: Missing MelonLoader/MelonLoader.dll. Please do not move it or whitelist it in your virus scanner.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*\\Phasmophobia.*
unhollowerErrors.error:
We do not support the use of MelonLoader on Phasmophobia,
 nor does Phasmophobia support MelonLoader.
Please remove MelonLoader, Mods, Plugins, UserData, NOTICE.txt, and version.dll.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*Unexpected escape character.*
unhollowerErrors.error: Please use forward slashes (`/`) in MelonPreferences.cfg

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*Invalid Version given to MelonInfoAttribute.*
unhollowerErrors.error: An invalid/broken mod attempted to load.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*Il2CppDumper\.BinaryStream\.ReadClassArray\[T\]\(Int64.*
unhollowerErrors.error: Please update [MelonLoader](https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader.Installer/releases/latest/download/MelonLoader.Installer.exe) to 0.4.0.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] System.Net.WebException: The remote name could not be resolved: 'github.com'
unhollowerErrors.error: Was unable to connect to GitHub. Make sure Proxy is disabled and DNS set properly. Maybe try [CloudFlare](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/setting-up-1.1.1.1/windows) or [Google](https://developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/using#windows) DNS servers DNS servers.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[ERROR\] System.Net.WebException: The operation has timed out
unhollowerErrors.error: Connection was timed out. Make sure Proxy is disabled and DNS set properly. Maybe try [CloudFlare](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/setting-up-1.1.1.1/windows) or [Google](https://developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/using#windows) DNS servers DNS servers.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*The system cannot find the file specified.
unhollowerErrors.error: File not found. Make sure the file path is clear of special characters like ' or try reinstalling MelonLoader.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] Can't download Unity Dependencies, Unstripping will NOT be done!
unhollowerErrors.error: MelonLoader failed to download Unity Dependencies. There may be an issue with your firewall or your ISP is blocking the download.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[ERROR\] Source Code ZIP Detected.*
unhollowerErrors.error: Please do not put the source zip in the Mods/Plugins folder. Either use the provided dll or complile the source yourself.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*due to: Could not load file or assembly '.*
unhollowerErrors.error: Please reinstall MelonLoader or whitelist MelonLoader in your virus scanner.

knownErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[INTERNAL FAILURE\] Failed to Read Unity Version from File Info or globalgamemanagers\!
knownErrors.error: MelonLoader failed to read your Unity version and game name. Try re-installing MelonLoader or delete UnityCrashHandler64.exe.

knownErrors.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[ERROR\] Settings load failed: System\.InvalidOperationException: The document has errors:.*
knownErrors.error: Mod config has been corrupted. Please delete UserData/MelonPreferences.cfg

knownErrors.regex: .*Tomlet.Exceptions.TomlEOFException: Found unexpected EOF on line \d+ when parsing TOML file
knownErrors.error: Mod config has been corrupted or emptied. Please remove UserData/MelonPreferences.cfg

knownErrors.regex: .*Expecting a newline character at the end of a statement on line \d+, but found an unexpected ','
knownErrors.error: Unexpected comma in ML settings. This issue has been fixed for the next update of ML but you can fix it temporarly by changing the decimal symbol to `.` in Window's settings.
The storage space is full. Please free some space and try your game again.

VRChat.regex: \[[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}.[0-9]{3}\] \[OculusPlayspaceMover\] \[ERROR\] OVRCameraRig not found, this mod only work in Oculus for now\!
VRChat.error: OculusPlayspaceMover does not work in SteamVR. It is recommended to use [OVR Advanced Settings](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1009850/) for playspace mover <https://youtu.be/E4ZByfPWTuM>.

DNS failed to resolve emmVRC servers. Please set your Window's settings to use [CloudFlare](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/setting-up-1.1.1.1/windows) or [Google](https://developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/using#windows) DNS servers.

VRChat.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[emmVRCLoader\] \[ERROR\] System.Net.WebException: The remote server returned an error: (404) Not Found.*
VRChat.error:
Please download [emmVRCLoader.dll](https://dl.emmvrc.com/downloads/emmVRCLoader.dll) and move to **Mods** folder
or [VRCModUpdater](https://s.slaynash.fr/VRCMULatest) and move it to the **Plugins** folder.

VRChat.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[emmVRCLoader\] You have emmVRC's Stealth Mode enabled..*
VRChat.error: You have emmVRC's Stealth Mode enabled. To access the functions menu, press the "Report World" button. Most visual functions of emmVRC have been disabled.
Please open Window's "Change Proxy Settings" and disable all three toggles.

emmVRC VRHud error is caused by `Show quick menu hud in desktop` or `HUD` being enabled when VRChat is started. The only issue it causes is the right emmVRC panel getting stuck in the initial conditions.
emmVRC Network is currently down. Staff are aware of this and working to bring it back online. Your favorites are safe and will return when the Network comes back online.
emmVRC Network is currently down. Staff are aware of this and working to bring it back online. Your favorites are safe and will return when the Network comes back online.

Failed to validate the emmVRC server certificate. Make sure [thetrueyoshifan.com](https://thetrueyoshifan.com/mods/emmvrc/) is accessible, or try re-setting the Set Automatically option in your computer's Date & Time settings.

VRChat.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[emmVRCLoader\] \[ERROR\] System.Net.WebException: The remote server returned an error: (502) Bad Gateway.*
VRChat.error: Please open Window's "Change Proxy Settings" and disable all three toggles. It also could a firewall blocking the connection.

VRChat.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[emmVRCLoader\] \[ERROR\] Your instance history file is invalid. It will be wiped.
VRChat.error: emmVRC instance history became corrupted and has been reset.

VRChat.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[emmVRCLoader\] \[ERROR\] System.Net.WebException: Error: ConnectFailure \(A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time.*
VRChat.error: emmVRC servers timed out. There is either heavy load or emmVRC servers is having some issues. Please wait while staff looks into the issue.

VRChat.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[emmVRCLoader\] \[ERROR\] emmVRC could not be accessed. Loading from disk, if possible...
VRChat.error: emmVRC failed to access emmVRC servers and attempted to load cached copy.
emmVRC failed to load Favorites. Please verify the integrity of VRChat or reinstall MelonLoader 0.4.0

VRChat.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[ERROR\] System.TypeLoadException: Could not resolve type with token 0100017c.*
VRChat.error: Errors detected are due to VRChat update 1102 changing the obfuscation for the Oculus build. We are working on fixing this issue.

VRChat.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[ERROR\] Exception in coroutine of type emmVRC.Hacks.EmojiFavourites.*
VRChat.error: emmVRC's Emoji Favorites is currently not working. We are working on fixing this issue.

BloonsTD6.regex: \[[0-9.:]+\] \[ERROR\] System.ArgumentException: No target method specified for class NKHook6.*
BloonsTD6.error: NKHook6 is no longer working. Please remove NKHook6 from your Mods folder.
all dartling is throwing a error and should be removed.

modSpecificErrors.CleanConsole: CleanConsole has been added into MelonLoader and no longer needed. Please remove CleanConsole from your Mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.ClearVRAM: ClearVRAM is no longer needed as this bug is now fixed in VRChat.
modSpecificErrors.ClickFix: ClickFix has been added into VRChat and will cause VRChat to crash. Please remove ClickFix from your Mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.CloseFix: CloseFix has been added into MelonLoader by adding `--quitfix` to the launch options. Please remove CloseFix from your Mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.DiscordRichPresence-ML: DiscordRichPresence-ML has been added into VRChat and also no longer works and can be removed.
modSpecificErrors.DownloadFix: DownloadFix is no longer needed as this bug is now fixed in VRChat.
modSpecificErrors.Final IK Sanity: Final IK Sanity has been added into VRChat and should be removed. Please remove `FinalIKSanity.dll` from your Mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.Multiplayer Dynamic Bones: Multiplayer Dynamic Bones is replaced by [MultiplayerDynamicBonesMod](https://api.vrcmg.com/v0/mods/165/MultiplayerDynamicBonesMod.dll), please download and replace `DBMod.dll` with it.
modSpecificErrors.MultiplayerDynamicBones: Multiplayer Dynamic Bones is replaced by [MultiplayerDynamicBonesMod](https://api.vrcmg.com/v0/mods/165/MultiplayerDynamicBonesMod.dll), please download and replace `DBMod.dll` with it.
modSpecificErrors.NoSteamP2P: NoSteamP2P has been added into VRChat and should be removed from your Mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.Player Volume Control: Player Volume Control has been added into VRChat and will cause issues. Please remove Player Volume Control from your Mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.PlayerVolumeControl: Player Volume Control has been added into VRChat and will cause issues. Please remove Player Volume Control from your Mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.PortableMirror: PortableMirror is replaced by [PortableMirrorMod](https://api.vrcmg.com/v0/mods/197/PortableMirrorMod.dll) by another creator, please download and replace `PortableMirror.dll` with it.
modSpecificErrors.Portal Confirmation: Portal Confirmation is replaced by [AskToPortal](https://api.vrcmg.com/v0/mods/152/AskToPortal.dll) by another creator, please download and replace `PortalConfirmation.dll` with it.
modSpecificErrors.YoutubeDLUpdater: YoutubeDLUpdater is no longer needed and should be removed.
modSpecificErrors.Gurren Core: Gurren Core is no longer needed and should be removed from the mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.NKHook6: NKHook6 is broken and should be removed from the mods folder.
